mc.name: Prosperity
mc.oracleText: Each player draws X cards.
mc.printedText: Each player draws X cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Wealth is a good thing, compared to poverty--your food is better, your robes are softer, and your companions have bathed more recently."
--Kukemssa pirate

mc.name: Hurricane
mc.oracleText: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
mc.printedText: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

mc.name: Ashnod's Altar
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Add {2} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Add two colorless mana to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: The Brothers' War scarred the land, but Ashnod left her mark in the bloodlines of those she tortured.

mc.name: Bog Rats
mc.oracleText: Bog Rats can't be blocked by Walls.
mc.printedText: Bog Rats can't be blocked by Walls.
mc.flavorText: Their stench was vile and strong enough, but not nearly as powerful as their hunger.

mc.name: Bottle of Suleiman
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you. If you win the flip, put a 5/5 Djinn artifact creature token with flying into play.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you. If you win the flip, put a 5/5 Djinn artifact creature token into play. That creature has flying.

mc.name: Conquer
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
You control enchanted land.
mc.printedText: You control enchanted land.
mc.flavorText:
"Why do we trade with those despicable elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them"
--Avram Garrisson,
Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

mc.name: Derelor
mc.oracleText: Black spells you play cost {B} more to play.
mc.printedText: Your black spells cost {B} more to play.
mc.flavorText:
"Strength it has, but at the cost of a continuous supply of energy. Such failure can bear only one result."
--Execution order of Endrek Sahr,
master breeder

mc.name: Disrupting Scepter
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Target player chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. Play this ability only during your turn.

mc.name: Divine Transformation
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
mc.flavorText: Glory surged through her and radiance surrounded her. All things were possible with the blessing of the Divine.

mc.name: Tranquil Grove
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.

mc.name: Gaseous Form
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature deals no combat damage.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature.

mc.name: Giant Strength
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
mc.flavorText:
"O it is excellent / To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous / To use it like a giant."
--William Shakespeare,
Measure for Measure

mc.name: Glasses of Urza
mc.oracleText: {T}: Look at target player's hand.
mc.printedText: {T}: Look at target player's hand.

mc.name: Hecatomb
mc.oracleText:
When Hecatomb comes into play, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures.
Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
When Hecatomb comes into play, you may sacrifice four creatures. If you don't, sacrifice Hecatomb.
Tap an untapped swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Icatian Town
mc.oracleText: Put four 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText: Put four 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens into play.
mc.flavorText: Icatia's once-peaceful towns faced increasing attacks from orcs and goblins as the climate cooled. By the time the empire fell, they were little more than armed camps.

mc.name: Inferno
mc.oracleText: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.flavorText: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead." Jaya Ballard, task mage

mc.name: Jade Monolith
mc.oracleText: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.
mc.printedText: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to you instead.

mc.name: Juxtapose
mc.oracleText: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.
mc.printedText: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. (If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, that player chooses between them.)

mc.name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard
mc.oracleText: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.
mc.printedText: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.
mc.flavorText:
Honorable in battle, generous in death.
--Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

mc.name: Living Lands
mc.oracleText: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.
mc.printedText: All forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

mc.name: Memory Lapse
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell. Put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"Um . . . oh . . . what was I saying?"
--Reveka, wizard savant

mc.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
mc.flavorText: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

mc.name: Orcish Artillery
mc.oracleText: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
mc.printedText: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: In a rare display of ingenuity, the orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.

mc.name: Order of the Sacred Torch
mc.oracleText: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target black spell.
mc.printedText: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target black spell.
mc.flavorText: A blazing light to drive out the shadows.

mc.name: Pestilence
mc.oracleText:
At end of turn, if no creatures are in play, sacrifice Pestilence.

{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText:
At end of turn, if there are no creatures in play, sacrifice Pestilence.
{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

mc.name: Pradesh Gypsies
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"A mysterious people indeed. Their origins are as secret as their traditions."
--Lord Magnus of Llanowar

mc.name: Primal Clay
mc.oracleText: Primal Clay comes into play as your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Shapeshifter Wall artifact creature with defender.
mc.printedText: Primal Clay comes into play as your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature; a 2/2 artifact creature with flying; or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature. (Walls can't attack.)

mc.name: Recall
mc.oracleText: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Remove Recall from the game.
mc.printedText: Choose and discard X cards from your hand, then return that many cards from your graveyard to your hand. Remove Recall from the game.

mc.name: Reverse Damage
mc.oracleText: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
mc.printedText: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

mc.name: Sabretooth Tiger
mc.oracleText: First strike
mc.printedText: First strike
mc.flavorText:
"I fear anything with teeth measured in handspans"
--Norin the Wary

mc.name: Sengir Autocrat
mc.oracleText:
When Sengir Autocrat comes into play, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens into play.
When Sengir Autocrat leaves play, remove all Serf tokens from the game.
mc.printedText:
When Sengir Autocrat comes into play, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens into play.
When Sengir Autocrat leaves play, remove all Serf tokens from play.

mc.name: Shatterstorm
mc.oracleText: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: Chains of leaping fire and sizzling lightning laid waste the artificers' handiwork, sparing not a single device.

mc.name: Sibilant Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: She had expected death to roar, to thunder, to growl. She did not recognize it when it came hissing to her side.

mc.name: Skull Catapult
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"
--Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

mc.name: Rag Man
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals his or her hand and discards a creature card at random. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.printedText: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Look at target opponent's hand. That player discards a creature card at random from it. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.flavorText: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"

mc.name: Spirit Link
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

mc.name: Stromgald Cabal
mc.oracleText: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.
mc.printedText: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.
mc.flavorText: When the alliance between Balduvia and Kjeldor deprived Stromgald of easy victories, its agents were forced to fuel their rituals with their own flesh.

mc.name: The Hive
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp into play. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Wasp artifact creature token into play. That creature has flying.
mc.flavorText: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.

mc.name: Tundra Wolves
mc.oracleText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText: First strike
mc.flavorText: I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains.

mc.name: Verduran Enchantress
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever you play an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Some say magic was first practiced by women, who have always felt strong ties to the land.

mc.name: Rampant Growth
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

mc.name: Viashino Warrior
mc.flavorText:
"When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins."
--Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

mc.name: Venerable Monk
mc.oracleText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

mc.oracleText: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

mc.oracleText: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

mc.oracleText: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

mc.name: Pacifism
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
mc.flavorText: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

mc.name: Disenchant
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mc.name: Remedy
mc.oracleText: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.
mc.printedText: Prevent the next 5 damage this turn divided any way you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.flavorText:
"These things will protect you while I'm gone, remind you of my love for you."
--"Love Song of Night and Day"

mc.name: Warrior's Honor
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Samite Healer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage to target creature or player this turn.
mc.flavorText: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

mc.name: Armored Pegasus
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

mc.name: Standing Troops
mc.oracleText: Vigilance
mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause Standing Troops to tap.
mc.flavorText: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

mc.name: D'Avenant Archer
mc.oracleText: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.flavorText: Avenant's archers are also trained as poets, so that each arrow is guided by a fragment of verse.

mc.name: Regal Unicorn
mc.flavorText: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.

mc.name: Ekundu Griffin
mc.oracleText: Flying, first strike
mc.printedText: Flying, first strike
mc.flavorText:
"My goat was a small price to pay for the chance to see the hunting griffin dive and seize it."
--Suq'Ata trader

mc.name: Longbow Archer
mc.oracleText: First strike, reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText:
First strike
Longbow Archer can block as though it had flying.
mc.flavorText:
"If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu."
--Roya, Zhalfirin archer

mc.name: Serra's Blessing
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause creatures you control to tap.
mc.flavorText:
"I have seen your strength imbued in angels' wings, and I have felt your sorrow rain down on the ruins brought by the Lord of the Wastes."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Castle
mc.oracleText: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
mc.printedText: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
mc.flavorText:
"Hang out our banners on the outward walls; / The cry is still, --'They come'; our castle's strength / Will laugh a siege to scorn."
--William Shakespeare, Macbeth

mc.name: Light of Day
mc.oracleText: Black creatures can't attack or block.
mc.printedText: Black creatures can't attack or block.
mc.flavorText:
"I do not miss sunlight. The very memory of it burns my eyes."
--Volrath

mc.name: Warmth
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a red spell, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever one of your opponents plays a red spell, you gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Flame grows gentle with but a little distance."
--Orim, Samite healer

mc.name: Kismet
mc.oracleText: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control come into play tapped.
mc.printedText: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents play come into play tapped.
mc.flavorText:
"Make people wait for what they want, and you have power over them. This is as true for merchants and militia as it is for cooks and couples."
--Gwendlyn Di Corci

mc.name: Heavy Ballista
mc.oracleText: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Archers, balliste--you can't even get near the island of Avenant."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Wall of Swords
mc.oracleText: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
Flying
mc.flavorText: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

mc.name: Ardent Militia
mc.oracleText: Vigilance
mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause Ardent Militia to tap.
mc.flavorText: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fight for hearth and home.

mc.name: Staunch Defenders
mc.oracleText: When Staunch Defenders comes into play, you gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: When Staunch Defenders comes into play, you gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Hold your position Leave doubt for the dying"
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Archangel
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Archangel to tap.
mc.flavorText:
"My mother once told me angels sing their swords' names with each strike."
--Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Sunweb
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
Flying
Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
mc.flavorText:
"There is no sweeter music than the wails of a dying dragon."
--Rashida Scalebane

mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mc.oracleText: Target player draws two cards.
mc.printedText: Target player draws two cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success."
--Sidar Jabari

mc.printedText: Counter target spell.

mc.oracleText: Counter target creature spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target creature spell.

mc.printedText: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: A lie always returns; be careful how you catch it.

mc.oracleText: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Flight
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gains flying.

mc.name: Sage Owl
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Sage Owl comes into play, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Sage Owl comes into play, look at the top four cards of your library and put them back in any order you choose.
mc.flavorText: The owl asks but never answers.

mc.name: Wind Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."
--William Blake,
The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

mc.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

mc.name: Horned Turtle
mc.flavorText:
"So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath."
--Selenia, dark angel

mc.name: Sea Monster
mc.oracleText: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
mc.printedText: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an island.
mc.flavorText: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Abduction comes into play, untap enchanted creature.
You control enchanted creature.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that card to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText:
When Abduction comes into play, untap enchanted creature.
You control enchanted creature.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that creature to play under its owner's control.

mc.oracleText: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
mc.printedText: (Walls can't attack.)
mc.flavorText:
"Huge walls of ice block further travel. We can't believe they are natural."
--Disa the Restless, journal entry

mc.oracleText: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
Flying
mc.flavorText:
When no falcons fly, beware the sky.

mc.name: Segovian Leviathan
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk
mc.printedText: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable if defending player controls an island.)
mc.flavorText:
"Leviathan, too Can you catch him with a fish-hook or run a line round his tongue?"
--The Bible, Job 41:1

mc.name: Phantom Warrior
mc.oracleText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
mc.printedText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
mc.flavorText: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

mc.printedText: Target player chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand, then draws as many cards as he or she discarded this way.

mc.printedText: Look at the top seven cards of your library and put two of them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

mc.printedText: All Merfolk get +1/+1 and gain islandwalk. (They're unblockable if defending player controls an island.)

mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.
mc.flavorText: In front of every great wizard is a doomed apprentice.

mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.

"a situation with no choices"

mc.name: Howl from Beyond
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

mc.printedText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mc.printedText: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Put that card on top of that player's library.

"It is terrible how one brief action can live forever in memory."

mc.printedText: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons.
mc.flavorText:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
--Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

mc.name: Razortooth Rats
mc.oracleText: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
mc.printedText: Razortooth Rats can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us."
--Crovax

mc.printedText: When Gravedigger comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: A full coffin is like a full coffer--both are attractive to thieves.

mc.name: Strands of Night
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.flavorText:
"I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams."
--Crovax

mc.name: Hidden Horror
mc.oracleText: When Hidden Horror comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.
mc.printedText: When Hidden Horror comes into play, choose and discard a creature card from your hand. If you don't, sacrifice Hidden Horror.

mc.name: Dread of Night
mc.oracleText: White creatures get -1/-1.
mc.printedText: White creatures get -1/-1.
mc.flavorText:
"These moonless, foreign skies keep me in thrall. Dark whispers echo in the night, and I cannot resist."
--Selenia, dark angel

mc.name: Perish
mc.oracleText: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Mind Warp
mc.oracleText: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards them.
mc.printedText: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards them.
mc.flavorText: The hardest of wizards can have the softest of minds.

mc.name: Leshrac's Rite
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has swampwalk.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gains swampwalk. (It's unblockable if defending player controls a swamp.)
mc.flavorText:
"Bind me to thee, my soul to thine. I am your servant and your slave. Blood for blood, flesh for flesh, Leshrac, my lord."
--Lim-Dul, the Necromancer

mc.name: Agonizing Memories
mc.oracleText: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put those cards on top of that player's library in any order you choose.
mc.flavorText:
"An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Bog Wraith
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable if defending player controls a swamp.)
mc.flavorText: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

mc.name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
mc.oracleText:
Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.
Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.
mc.printedText:
Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.
Except for Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore, creatures you control can't attack.
mc.flavorText: The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat.

mc.name: Zombie Master
mc.oracleText:
Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk.
All other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."
mc.printedText: All Zombies gain "{B}: Regenerate this creature" and swampwalk. (They're unblockable if defending player controls a swamp.)
mc.flavorText: He controlled the zombies even before his own death; now nothing can make them betray him.

mc.name: Infernal Contract
mc.oracleText: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.
mc.printedText: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.
mc.flavorText:
"But I signed nothing"
--Taraneh, Suq'Ata mage

mc.printedText: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:

mc.printedText: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."

mc.printedText: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided any way you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.flavorText:
"Hiniya Behold the man of flint, that's me / Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."
--Navajo war chant

mc.flavorText:

mc.printedText: Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)

mc.printedText: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:

mc.printedText: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

(Walls can't attack.)

mc.oracleText: Flying, haste

mc.oracleText: Untap all creatures you control.

mc.flavorText: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

mc.flavorText: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.

mc.name: Giant Spider
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

mc.flavorText: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

mc.flavorText: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

mc.flavorText: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

mc.name: Fountain of Youth
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: The fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.

mc.name: Ornithopter
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."
--Urza, in his apprenticeship

mc.name: Rod of Ruin
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Soul Net
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

mc.name: Aladdin's Ring
mc.oracleText: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
". . . The magician drew a ring off his finger . . . , saying: --'It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'"
--The Arabian Nights,
Junior Classics trans.

mc.name: Ankh of Mishra
mc.oracleText: Whenever a land comes into play, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a land comes into play, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.flavorText: Tawnos finally cracked the puzzle: the strange structures did not house Mishra's malevolent creations but were themselves among his creations.

mc.name: Dancing Scimitar
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Bobbing merrily from opponent to opponent, the scimitar began adding playful little flourishes to its strokes; it even turned a couple of somersaults.

mc.name: Dingus Egg
mc.oracleText: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from play, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from play, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

mc.name: Flying Carpet
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

mc.name: Howling Mine
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws a card.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

mc.name: Jalum Tome
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then choose and discard a card from your hand.
mc.flavorText: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

mc.name: Jayemdae Tome
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.

mc.name: Meekstone
mc.oracleText: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
mc.printedText: Each creature with power 3 or greater doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mc.flavorText: When the mighty sleep, the lowly prowl.

mc.name: Millstone
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Put the top two cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

mc.name: Pentagram of the Ages
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.flavorText: A mirror, a shield, a promise, a great distance, and a kind word--five ways to avoid harm.

mc.name: Exile
mc.oracleText: Remove target nonwhite attacking creature from the game. You gain life equal to its toughness.
mc.printedText: Remove target nonwhite attacking creature from the game. You gain life equal to its toughness.

mc.name: Reprisal
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."
--Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

mc.name: Celestial Dawn
mc.oracleText:
Lands you control are Plains.
Nonland cards you own that aren't in play, spells you control, and nonland permanents you control are white.
You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.
mc.printedText: Nonland cards you own that aren't in play are white. Nonland permanents you control are white. Lands you control are plains. Colored mana symbols in the costs on all those cards and permanents are {W}.

mc.name: Enlightened Tutor
mc.oracleText: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
mc.printedText: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
mc.flavorText:
"I do not teach. I simply reveal."
--Daudi, Femeref tutor

mc.name: Ethereal Champion
mc.oracleText: Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ethereal Champion this turn.
mc.printedText: Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 1 damage to Ethereal Champion this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"If I have learned anything as a wizard it is this: never fight your own battles."
--Waffa, sorcerer of Nyomba

mc.name: Unyaro Griffin
mc.oracleText:
Flying

Sacrifice Unyaro Griffin: Counter target red instant or sorcery spell.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice Unyaro Griffin: Counter target red instant or sorcery spell.
mc.flavorText: The griffin's shadow gives courage to the righteous and dread to the idle.

mc.name: Daraja Griffin
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Sacrifice Daraja Griffin: Destroy target black creature.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice Daraja Griffin: Destroy target black creature.
mc.flavorText:
"And the flamingos said, --'Get out of our nest--we can't be seen with the likes of you' So, the griffin ate them."
--Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

mc.name: Infantry Veteran
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
--Telim'Tor

mc.name: Serenity
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"Just think of me as the storm before the calm."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Tariff
mc.oracleText: Each player sacrifices the creature he or she controls with the highest converted mana cost unless he or she pays that creature's mana cost. If two creatures a player controls are tied for highest cost, that player chooses one.
mc.printedText: Each player chooses a creature with the highest converted mana cost he or she controls, then pays mana equal to that cost or sacrifices that creature.

mc.name: Resistance Fighter
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Resistance Fighter: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Resistance Fighter: Target creature deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"My soldiers fought without hesitation, died without doubt."
--Sidar Jabari

mc.name: Diminishing Returns
mc.oracleText: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You remove the top ten cards of your library from the game. Then each player draws up to seven cards.
mc.printedText: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You remove the top ten cards of your library from the game. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

mc.name: Library of Lat-Nam
mc.oracleText: An opponent chooses one - You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep; or you search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Target opponent chooses one You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep; or you search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, and then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Dream Cache
mc.oracleText: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.
mc.printedText: Draw three cards. Choose two cards from your hand and put both on either the top or the bottom of your library.
mc.flavorText:
Dreams' riches are easily spent.
--Suq'Ata adage

mc.name: Harmattan Efreet
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{1}{U}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{1}{U}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"One moment I was walking along the beach, and the next I was high in the air, staring into a hideous smiling face."
--Tarub, Suq'Ata sailor

mc.name: Mystical Tutor
mc.oracleText: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
mc.printedText: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
mc.flavorText:
"To the tutors, a --'poem of sand' was of little account, a --'poem of ivory,' priceless."
--Afari, Tales

mc.name: Psychic Transfer
mc.oracleText: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.
mc.printedText: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.
mc.flavorText:
"The memory of your existence will fade like the final stars of morning."
--Kaervek

mc.name: Desertion
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card into play under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell. If it's an artifact or creature card, put it into play under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.
mc.flavorText: First the insult, then the injury.

mc.name: Air Elemental
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

mc.name: Zur's Weirding
mc.oracleText:
Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
mc.printedText:
Players play with their hands revealed.
Whenever a player would draw a card, instead reveal it. Any other player may pay 2 life to put that card into its owner's graveyard. If no one does, that player then draws the card.

mc.name: Relearn
mc.oracleText: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Barrin taught me that the hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Insight
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a green spell, you draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever one of your opponents plays a green spell, you draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"We can fight with you or against you. After my day, I'd prefer the former."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Spell Blast
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell with converted mana cost equal to X.
mc.flavorText: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

mc.name: Greed
mc.oracleText: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. There is no greater guilt than discontentment. And there is no greater disaster than greed."
--Lao Tsu, Tao Te Ching, (trans. Chan)

mc.name: Syphon Soul
mc.oracleText: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
mc.printedText: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

mc.name: Abyssal Specter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

mc.name: Dry Spell
mc.oracleText: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.flavorText:
"Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer."
--Autumn Willow

mc.name: Abyssal Hunter
mc.oracleText: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. Abyssal Hunter deals damage equal to Abyssal Hunter's power to that creature.
mc.printedText: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. Abyssal Hunter deals damage equal to its power to that creature.
mc.flavorText: Some smiles show cheer; some merely show teeth.

mc.name: Ashen Powder
mc.oracleText: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard into play under your control.
mc.printedText: Put target creature card from one of your opponents' graveyards into play under your control.
mc.flavorText:
"What you call decay, I call ripening. You'll gain no sustenance from this harvest."
--Kaervek

mc.name: Blighted Shaman
mc.oracleText:
{T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}, Sacrifice a swamp: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Enfeeblement
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
mc.flavorText:
"If it is weak, either kill it or ignore it. Anything else honors it."
--Kaervek

mc.name: Feral Shadow
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Not all shadows are cast by light--some are cast by darkness.

mc.name: Forbidden Crypt
mc.oracleText:
If you would draw a card, return a card from your graveyard to your hand instead. If you can't, you lose the game.
If a card would be put into your graveyard, remove that card from the game instead.
mc.printedText:
Whenever you would draw a card, instead return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, you lose the game.
Whenever a card would be put into your graveyard, instead remove that card from the game.

mc.name: Gravebane Zombie
mc.oracleText: If Gravebane Zombie would be put into a graveyard from play, put Gravebane Zombie on top of its owner's library instead.
mc.printedText: When Gravebane Zombie would be put into a graveyard from play, instead put Gravebane Zombie on top of its owner's library.

mc.name: Necrosavant
mc.oracleText: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to play. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
{3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to play.
Play this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Python
mc.flavorText:
"How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?"
--Hakim, Loreweaver

mc.name: Vampiric Tutor
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
"I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets."
--Shauku, Endbringer

mc.name: Nightmare
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of swamps you control.
mc.flavorText: As the poisoned land spreads, so does the nightmare's rage and terrifying strength.

mc.name: Doomsday
mc.oracleText: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and remove the rest from the game. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.
mc.printedText: Search your library and graveyard for five cards of your choice and remove the rest from the game. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order you choose. You lose half your life, rounded up.

mc.name: Mischievous Poltergeist
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Pay 1 life: Regenerate Mischievous Poltergeist.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Pay 1 life: Regenerate Mischievous Poltergeist.
mc.flavorText:
"The past is a ghost that haunts you from the moment it exists until the moment you don't."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Blight
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
mc.printedText: When enchanted land is tapped, destroy it.

mc.name: Blood Pet
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "You are wrong," Volrath said. "I do not hate the living. They often prove quite useful to me." And then he laughed.

mc.name: Obsianus Golem
mc.flavorText:
"The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . . ."
--"Song of the Artificer"

mc.name: Storm Cauldron
mc.oracleText:
Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.

Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.
Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Amber Prison
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step.

{4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. As long as Amber Prison remains tapped, that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step.
{4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. As long as Amber Prison is tapped, that permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

mc.name: Cursed Totem
mc.oracleText: Activated abilities of creatures can't be played.
mc.printedText: Players can't play activated abilities of creatures.
mc.flavorText:
Pass me from soul to soul, / soldier to herder, herder to beast, beast to soil / until I am everywhere. / Then pass me those souls.
--Totem inscription (translated)

mc.name: Fire Diamond
mc.oracleText:
Fire Diamond comes into play tapped.

{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Fire Diamond comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Grinning Totem
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and remove it from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and set that card aside. That player then shuffles his or her library. You may play the card as though it were in your hand. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played the card, put it into its owner's graveyard.

mc.name: Lead Golem
mc.oracleText: Whenever Lead Golem attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
mc.printedText: Whenever Lead Golem attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
mc.flavorText: Slow and heavy swings the club.

mc.name: Patagia Golem
mc.oracleText: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It scattered falcons like a lion hunting among jackals.

mc.name: Snake Basket
mc.oracleText: {X}, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Put X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens into play. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText: {X}, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Put X 1/1 green Cobra creature tokens into play. Play this ability only if you're allowed to play a sorcery.
mc.flavorText:
"Uh, does anyone have a flute?"
--Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

mc.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player counts the cards in his or her hand, puts them on the bottom of his or her library, and then draws that many cards.

mc.name: Wand of Denial
mc.oracleText: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.
mc.printedText: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.
mc.flavorText: You'll never miss what you never had.

mc.name: Dragon Engine
mc.oracleText: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"How is it the legged engines seem so much more alive than their wheeled counterparts? Simply, they were born, not made."
--Mishra

mc.name: Crystal Vein
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}, Sacrifice Crystal Vein: Add {2} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Crystal Vein: Add two colorless mana to your mana pool.

mc.name: Goblin Hero
mc.flavorText:
"When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero--everyone else just has to step back"
--Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

mc.name: Goblin Recruiter
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Recruiter comes into play, search your library for any number of Goblin cards and reveal them. Shuffle your library, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Recruiter comes into play, search your library for any number of Goblin cards you choose. Reveal those cards, then shuffle your library and put them on top of it in any order you choose.
mc.flavorText: "Next"

mc.name: Spitting Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{R}: Spitting Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Spitting Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Spend no more than {R} this way each turn.
mc.flavorText: It prefers its meals cooked.

mc.name: Fire Elemental
mc.flavorText: Fire elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.

mc.name: Hammer of Bogardan
mc.oracleText:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan to your hand. Play this ability only during your upkeep and only if Hammer of Bogardan is in your graveyard.

mc.name: Goblin Warrens
mc.oracleText: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
mc.flavorText: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late." Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

mc.name: Balduvian Horde
mc.oracleText: When Balduvian Horde comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
mc.printedText: When Balduvian Horde comes into play, discard a card at random from your hand. If you don't, sacrifice Balduvian Horde.

mc.name: Crimson Hellkite
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana this way.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana this way.
mc.flavorText:
"Dragonfire forged me a warrior."
--Rashida Scalebane

mc.name: Reckless Embermage
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.
mc.printedText: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.
mc.flavorText: Many mages have been consumed by their work.

mc.name: Gorilla Chieftain
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
mc.flavorText:
"In the soil of leadership sprout the seeds of immortality."
--Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper

mc.name: Creeping Mold
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
mc.printedText: Destroy target artifact, land, or enchantment.
mc.flavorText:
"Mold could catch you."
--Suq'Ata insult

mc.name: Worldly Tutor
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the revealed card back on top of it.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
mc.flavorText:
"Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels."
--Afari, Tales

mc.name: Dense Foliage
mc.oracleText: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.
mc.printedText: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.
mc.flavorText:
"Big plants not only good for hidin', but full o' tasty bugs, too."
--Squee, goblin cabin hand

mc.name: Call of the Wild
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
